      • loadImage

        void loadImage(java.lang.String path,
               int width,
               int height,
               javafx.scene.Node element)
        loads the ImageView or the AnchorPane's background images
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the image that has to be loaded
        width - the width of the image that has to be loaded
        height - the height of the image that has to be loaded
        element - the Node where the image will be loaded

      • controlPathWeapon

        public void controlPathWeapon(java.lang.String path)
        add to weaponSelected (ImageView) the weapon (also power up) selected with a mouse click
        Parameters:
        path - the path of weapon image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - any exception thrown by the underlying OutputStream public void weaponClick(MouseEvent e){ String path; ImageView selected = (ImageView) e.getSource(); path = selected.getImage().getUrl(); Image weaponClicked = new Image(path); weaponSelected.setImage(weaponClicked); controlPathWeapon(path); } control if the name of weapon is contains in the path of image and set a tha weaponInfo (Label) with the corresponding description
        java.io.IOException - any exception thrown by the underlying OutputStream
